articles.title: Oppo quietly launches 4G version of Oppo A78 with fast charging, India price set at Rs 17,499 - India Today
articles.description: The highlight of the Oppo A78 4G is the battery and the supported charging speed. The device houses a 5000mAh battery with 67W SuperVOOC fast charging.
